name: Pac-Man 2: The New Adventures
overview: Enter an original animated adventure - with the world's first video game hero! But the star of your cartoon has a mind of his own, and it's going to take all your skills and patience to carefully guide Pac-Man through his hilarious, action-packed cartoon adventure! With a revolutionary new Character Guidance Interface (CGI), Pac-Man 2 is a game unlike anything you've ever experienced before. So step into Pac-Man's new exciting interactive cartoon world... It's a whole new way to play!
